availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Tennessee attorney and soldier. Served as a major with Bradfordâ€™s Battalion from 1863 to 1865. Mistakenly organized as the 13th Tennessee Cavalry and later renamed as the 14th Tennessee Cavalry.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Tennessee, of the Military Forces of the State, from 1861 to 1866 (Nashville: S. C. Mercer, Printer to the States, 1866), 639-638; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Obion County, Civil District No 6, p. 275.
